channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Woman Who Received Pig Kidney Transplant Has It Removed
item.description: Surgeons at NYU took out the pig kidney because it wasn’t getting enough blood flow.

item.title: You can now customize your For You feed on Threads using swipes
item.description: Instagram Threads is rolling out the ability for users to signal which sort of posts they wanted to see more or less of by swiping. © 2024 TechCrunch....

item.title: The 11 Best Travel Adapters (2024): Plug Adapters and Universal Adapters
item.description: When going abroad, the right plugs are essential to keeping your gadgets charged. These are our favorites.

item.title: Japanese billionaire pulls plug on private ‘dearMoon’ lunar Starship mission

item.title: Sonos Ace Review: The Most Comfortable Headphones for Travel
item.description: The king of whole-home audio is heading outside and already sits at the highest echelon of noise-canceling headphones.

item.title: People are using AI music generators to create hateful songs
item.description: Malicious actors are abusing generative AI music tools to create homophobic, racist, and propagandic songs — and publishing guides instructing others ...

item.title: Lovense Mini Sex Machine Review: All the Key Features at an Affordable Price
item.description: Lovense's newest sex toy offers all the benefits of pricey sex machines at a more affordable price.

item.title: What to expect from Apple’s AI-powered iOS 18 at WWDC
item.description: As WWDC 2024 nears, all sorts of rumors and leaks have emerged about what iOS 18 and its AI-powered apps and features have in store. © 2024 TechCrunch...

item.title: The Big-Tech Clean Energy Crunch Is Here

item.title: GM’s Cruise is testing robotaxis in Dallas again
item.description: Dallas is the second city that Cruise is easing its way back into after pulling its entire U.S. fleet late last year. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights re...
